Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $10,000 to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the effort put into its creation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to providing unparalleled value to our esteemed clients. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
